DOC.brief_title: BAY81-8781 , I.V . Aspirin Indication Acute Coronary Syndrome ( ACS )
DOC.detailed_description: In November 2009 company 's decision cancel study international trial . However , support local MA application Aspirin i.v . indication `` For initial treatment case suspicion acute coronary syndrome '' , Bayer decide perform trial Germany domestic trial , change number participant study date .
